page.title: 03DOGSTHORPE BRICKWORKS 2
page.content: Until about 60 years ago bricks were taken from the old{Dogsthorpe Railway, but now they travel by road.The factory is owned by the{London Brick {Company}which has 9 sites across{ {England.}The{Brickworks}also own{ {Eastwood Farm}now since 1955.There were originally over 100 acres but as the clay pits advances,the farm is decreasing.The main crop this year is wheat,but last year it was oil_seed rape.The farm is controlled from{ {Yaxley}about 12 miles away,and the chief market is at{Thetford. {}
